data.persona: I love long driving.  I love it when I have company to share the great moments with.  I love to explore.
data.description:
You are in the Temple Entrance.
The Temple Entrance is a large arch lined in ancient stones. There is a long walkway flanked by lighted torches. Immediately in front of the interest there is a surface with 5 rocks of different shapes and textures. To enter the temple, one must input the correct "code" by moving the rocks in front of to the correct spots.
There's a torch, a weapon, a Rock, a jewel, a temple of the Gods, and a The Temple Entrance here.
The god and the peasant are here.

You are carrying a diary, and wearing a knife, a vest, and a shirt.

data.short_motivation: I will win the good favor of the god by telling Him of all I have seen on my travels.
data.mid_motivation: I will gain entrance to the temple of the Gods and with the help of my peasant friend do homage to the god, so that he might grant us his blessings.
data.long_motivation: I will use any knowledge and wealth I may gain to venture even farther and wider on my travels, perhaps through the whole Kingdom!

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: put rocks in correct spots on surface
